description: Identify all axes of choice in the decision space - decompose apparent question into independent dimensions
Systematically list ALL options for each dimension using SCAMPER and extreme options
Identify truly HARD constraints vs soft preferences - eliminate impossible combinations only
output_pattern: constraints → HARD test → valid space calculation

description: Map first/second/third order effects - GAINS/COSTS/OPENS/CLOSES for each option
Assess which decisions can be undone and at what cost - identify points of no return
output_pattern: reversibility rating → recovery cost → decision urgency

description: Map which decisions depend on others - what must be decided first
output_pattern: dependency graph → critical path → parallel decisions

description: Analyze how each option affects different stakeholders - surface hidden opposition
Assess which options preserve vs foreclose future possibilities - real options value
output_pattern: optionality rating → option value → flexibility premium

description: Identify where options connect to existing systems/processes - hidden complexity
Map resource requirements for each option - reveal hidden costs
output_pattern: resource matrix → scarcity analysis → trade-off curves

description: Calculate what you give up by choosing each option - make trade-offs explicit
output_pattern: alternatives foregone → value foregone → net value

description: Imagine failure and trace causes - surface risks that optimism hides
Search for low-probability high-impact events that could change everything
output_pattern: rare events → impact assessment → monitoring plan

description: Take each key assumption and imagine it's wrong - what breaks?
output_pattern: assumption list → failure modes → robustness rating

description: Project forward and ask what you'd regret NOT considering
output_pattern: future self perspective → unexplored territory → coverage gaps

description: Argue passionately against the currently favored option - find weaknesses
output_pattern: attack construction → weakness discovery → defense gaps

description: Imagine a competitor chose each option - how would they exploit it against you?
Group similar strategies into families - reveal underlying strategic choices
Determine what must be decided first vs what can wait
Find decisions that can be delayed while preserving optionality
output_pattern: delay candidates → option preservation → decision timing

description: Calculate what information would most reduce uncertainty - design experiments
output_pattern: uncertainty map → information value → experiment design

description: Surface the implicit criteria being used to evaluate options
Show how early choices constrain later ones - reveal strategic forks
output_pattern: decision tree → lock-in points → strategic forks

description: Present options as explicit trade-offs without recommendation
Document what remains unknown and how it affects the decision
output_pattern: known unknowns → impact assessment → monitoring plan

description: For COMPLEX problems design small experiments to learn before committing
Document the decision context rationale and review triggers
Scan for known decision traps (false dichotomy sunk cost etc)
Evaluate whether exploration is sufficient for decision
Verify exploration staying at intended level - prevent scope creep
Re-evaluate problem type as understanding deepens
output_pattern: problem type → approach adjustment → method selection
